content.metaTitle: Villa MIR0147 - Luxury 4 Bed Villa Jávea €1,285,000
content.metaDescription: New build luxury villa in exclusive Cap Martí, Jávea. 4 bedrooms, 1000m² plot, private pool. Mountain views, 7 mins to Arenal beach. €1,285,000
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa MIR0147, an exceptional new build luxury villa nestled in the prestigious Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar area of Jávea. This stunning 4-bedroom, 4-bathroom villa represents the pinnacle of Mediterranean elegance, combining contemporary design with the natural beauty of Costa Blanca's most coveted location.

Set on an expansive 1000m² plot with breathtaking mountain and countryside views, this €1,285,000 masterpiece by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana offers 165m² of meticulously crafted living space. Just 7 minutes from the golden sands of Arenal beach and moments from Jávea's finest amenities, Villa MIR0147 presents an unparalleled opportunity to own a slice of paradise on Spain's most desirable coastline.

locationSection.intro:
Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar represents one of Jávea's most exclusive residential enclaves, where luxury meets tranquility in perfect harmony. This elevated position offers residents the perfect balance of privacy and accessibility, with panoramic views stretching across rolling hills to the sparkling Mediterranean beyond. The area is renowned for its peaceful atmosphere, making it a sanctuary for those seeking an escape from the ordinary while remaining connected to all essential amenities.

Jávea itself is considered the jewel of the Costa Blanca, where ancient history meets modern sophistication. This charming coastal town has attracted discerning international buyers for decades, drawn by its unique microclimate, stunning natural parks, and vibrant cultural scene. From world-class restaurants to championship golf courses, from pristine beaches to scenic hiking trails, Jávea offers a lifestyle that seamlessly blends relaxation with adventure.
highlights: Just 7 minutes drive to the famous Arenal beach with its golden sand and crystal-clear waters
1 km from restaurants, supermarkets, and essential services for ultimate convenience
Surrounded by Montgó Natural Park offering hiking trails and protected landscapes
Premium location in one of Jávea's most sought-after residential areas
Easy access to Valencia (1 hour) and Alicante airport (1.5 hours) via excellent transport links

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa MIR0147 showcases the finest in contemporary Mediterranean architecture, where every detail has been carefully considered to create a home of exceptional quality and comfort. Built by prestigious developer Miralbo Urbana, this villa exemplifies their commitment to excellence with premium materials, cutting-edge design, and seamless indoor-outdoor living.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms and 4 luxurious bathrooms across 165m² of elegant living space
Expansive 1000m² private plot offering complete privacy and room for outdoor entertainment
Designer kitchen with premium appliances and sleek contemporary finishes
Open-plan living and dining areas with floor-to-ceiling windows maximizing natural light
Private swimming pool with surrounding terraces perfect for al fresco dining
Breathtaking mountain and countryside views from multiple vantage points
Beautifully landscaped gardens with low-maintenance Mediterranean plants
High-quality materials and finishes throughout, delivered turnkey ready
Modern design seamlessly blending indoor and outdoor living spaces
Energy-efficient construction with excellent insulation and climate control

content.investmentSection:
Jávea's property market has demonstrated exceptional resilience and growth, making Villa MIR0147 not just a lifestyle investment but a sound financial decision. The Cap Martí area has seen consistent appreciation in property values, driven by limited supply of premium plots and ever-increasing demand from international buyers seeking luxury homes in this exclusive location. New build properties by established developers like Miralbo Urbana command premium prices and maintain strong resale values.

The combination of Jávea's year-round appeal, its status as a UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, and the growing trend towards remote working has created unprecedented demand for luxury villas. Properties in this price range and location typically achieve strong rental yields during peak seasons, while the limited availability of new development land ensures long-term capital appreciation. With Spain's Golden Visa program and favorable tax regime for international residents, Villa MIR0147 represents an ideal entry point into the European luxury property market.
whyBuySection: Prestigious location in one of Costa Blanca's most exclusive and sought-after residential areas
New build construction with 10-year structural guarantee and modern building standards
Renowned developer Miralbo Urbana with proven track record of quality and timely delivery
Turnkey delivery with premium materials and finishes included in the price
Exceptional rental potential due to Jávea's year-round tourism appeal
Strong capital appreciation prospects in limited-supply luxury market
Perfect climate with over 300 days of sunshine annually and mild winters

faqs.question: What is the total price and what payment terms are available?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0147 is priced at €1,285,000. We can arrange flexible payment terms including reservation deposits, stage payments during construction, and mortgage assistance through our partner Habeno to help secure competitive financing.

faqs.question: How far is the property from beaches and amenities?
faqs.answer: The villa is just 7 minutes drive from Arenal beach, Jávea's main sandy beach with restaurants and water sports. Essential amenities including supermarkets, restaurants, and services are within 1 km of the property.

faqs.question: What is included in the turnkey delivery?
faqs.answer: The turnkey delivery includes premium kitchen appliances, bathroom fittings, flooring throughout, air conditioning, landscaped gardens, swimming pool, and all interior finishes. The property will be ready to move in upon completion.

faqs.question: When will the villa be completed?
faqs.answer: Construction timelines vary depending on when construction begins. Once you reserve, we'll provide exact completion dates. Miralbo Urbana has an excellent track record for on-time delivery of their projects.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno, specialist mortgage brokers who can secure competitive rates for international buyers. Spanish banks typically lend up to 70% for non-residents with attractive interest rates.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this property?
faqs.answer: Jávea enjoys year-round rental demand with properties in this category achieving €2,000-4,000 per week in peak season and strong winter rentals. The combination of luxury amenities and prime location ensures excellent occupancy rates.

faqs.question: What are the ongoing costs of ownership?
faqs.answer: Annual costs include property tax (IBI) approximately €1,500, community fees (if applicable), utilities, insurance, and maintenance. Total annual costs typically range from €3,000-5,000 depending on usage and services required.

faqs.question: Can I view the property and what is the buying process?
faqs.answer: We can arrange site visits to see the location and show you similar completed properties by the developer. The buying process involves reservation, due diligence, private purchase contract, and completion at the notary with full legal support.

content.conclusion: Villa MIR0147 represents a rare opportunity to secure a luxury new build home in one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious locations. With Miralbo Urbana's reputation for excellence, stunning mountain views, and proximity to Jávea's finest beaches and amenities, this property offers the perfect blend of investment potential and lifestyle excellence. Contact our team today at +34 634 044 970 or via WhatsApp to arrange your private viewing and discover why discerning buyers choose Jávea for their Mediterranean dream home.
